org.title: Alter Ego
org.description: For the past Alter Ego has been gathering new political leaders to find our way out of this crisis moment in history. Our new media series profiles the big ideas that are emerging from the pioneering edge of the political conversation. Itâ€™s a beautiful network of leaders who are prototyping a deeper form of change, people who know that we need to change at a psychological and cultural level to have a chance of making it through this crisis moment in history
org.Priority to speak to?: High - won't fund us. Would be good to connect with as fellow thought-leaders, and network-builders.
